title: Letterhead, "IBM - half sheet", ca. 1956
inscribed:
Imprinted in black ink on upper left corner: IBM; upper right quadrant: Date:/ From:/ Department:/ Location:; below IBM logo, upper left quadrant: To: Department:/ Location:/ Subject and*/or Reference:; upper right (below date etc.): CC:; lower right corner: 10-5564-5

* printed in text
description: Half letterhead, cream colored with black ink.  IBM logo in black contour, upper left corner, beneath this, thin horizontal band across page; vertical thick black line intersects band, upper right. Upper right corner, space for date and information on from whom memo sent.  Upper left quadrant space for information on memo recipient and memo subject. Upper right quadrant: CC:

tombstone.epitaph:
Letterhead, "IBM - half sheet", ca. 1956.
ca. 1956. Offset lithograph on cream paper. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-62.
